hero.title: Smart Handwriting. Reimagined.
hero.subtitle: Experience the natural feel of pen on paper, instantly digitized and enhanced by AI. Designed for modern meetings, creative collaboration, and personalized education.

pp100.title: iDma PP-100
pp100.subtitle: AI Smart Meeting Notebook
pp100.description: Your exclusive AI meeting assistant. Write on real paper with a natural feel, and let our AI digitize, organize, and summarize your notes instantly.

pp110.title: iDma PP-110
pp110.subtitle: Smart Sync Whiteboard
pp110.description: Instant collaboration for agile teams. Sync handwriting directly to digital screens in real-time. Essential for brainstorming sessions and hybrid work environments.

pp120.title: iDma PP-120
pp120.subtitle: AI Smart Tutoring System
pp120.description: AI-powered personalized tutoring. Built for precision education, blending traditional handwriting with AI analysis to track progress and enhance learning outcomes.

zoom.title: Works perfectly with Zoom.
zoom.subtitle: No complex setup. No new software to learn. Just connect and start writing to share your ideas instantly in any Zoom meeting.
zoom.seamlessDesc: Our hardware integrates directly with Zoom's whiteboard and screen sharing capabilities. Whether you are teaching a math class or brainstorming a product roadmap, your handwriting appears on screen with zero lag.
zoom.secureDesc: Security is built-in, not bolted on. Your data is encrypted end-to-end, and we comply with GDPR standards to ensure your meeting content remains confidential and secure.

company.tagline: Reimagining the future of education and work.

hero.title: Solutions for Every Use Case
hero.subtitle: Whether you're delivering 1:1 tutoring, managing classroom sessions, or conducting enterprise training, iDma can help enhance your teaching and collaboration.

tutoring.title: 1:1 Tutoring
tutoring.description: Perfect for individual tutoring sessions where real-time interaction and immediate feedback are essential. The dual-board setup enables tutors to see student work instantly and provide corrections as they happen.
tutoring.card: Teacher and student each have their own device, enabling seamless two-way interaction.

smallGroup.title: Small Group Classes
smallGroup.description: Ideal for small group tutoring and workshops. The teacher's handwriting is shared with all participants, while individual students can contribute when called upon.

features.1: Shared teacher board for all students

smallGroup.card: Multiple students can participate, with the teacher's board visible to all.

classroom.title: Classroom Capture
classroom.description: Capture classroom teaching sessions for students who need to review material later or for those who couldn't attend. All handwriting and annotations are recorded automatically.
classroom.card: Every stroke is captured, making it easy to review and share lessons.

enterprise.title: Meeting Minutes & Knowledge Capture
enterprise.description: Designed for enterprise training and knowledge sharing. Capture whiteboard discussions, diagrams, and collaborative notes during meetings. AI summaries help document key points and action items.
enterprise.card: Capture whiteboard sessions, diagrams, and collaborative notes during meetings.

deployment.title: Deployment Options
deployment.subtitle: Choose the deployment model that best fits your organization's needs and security requirements.

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.description: Fully managed cloud deployment with automatic updates and scalable infrastructure. Ideal for most schools and tutoring centers.

onPremises.title: On-Premises
onPremises.description: Deploy iDma on your own servers for maximum control and data sovereignty. Suitable for enterprises with strict security requirements.

hybrid.title: Hybrid
hybrid.description: Combine cloud and on-premises components to balance flexibility with control. Perfect for organizations with mixed requirements.

cta.title: Find the Right Solution for You
cta.subtitle: Contact us to discuss your specific needs and deployment preferences.
